meanings.sent1: He was skiting about his new bike to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys skiting about her achievements at work.
meanings.sent3: The little boy was skiting to his friends about his high score in the game.
meanings.sent4: The peacock skiting proudly, showing off its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent5: The politician was skiting so loudly that even the birds stopped chirping.

meanings.sent1: She is known as the biggest skiting in our school.
